comment.author: 46047195@N00
comment._content:
This is a testimonial to M/Sgt Frank Krider Jr. from Inbok Kim, a wing commander of South Korea.

Inbok Kim thanks to him about his remarkable achievements (especially on effective maintenance support for F-86D) during September 1, 1960 to June 12, 1961.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
